The call of the wild - life outside of the ivory tower.

The call of the wild - herpetologist gives up academia to work in a zoo!!

This week's Working Life: 

"I can attest that rewarding career options in science can be found outside of the ivory tower, and to the value of having an open mind so that when serendipity knocks, you at least notice it."
